name: Dark Templar
description: Deadly warrior assassin. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies without detection. Can transform into an Archon

abilities.name: Invisible
abilities.description: Allows Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Increases the movement speed of Zealots.

abilities.name: Shadow Stride
abilities.description: Allows Dark Templars to teleport to a nearby target location.

abilities.name: Archon Merge
abilities.description: Sacrifices 2 Templar to create an Archon.
